title: 150 - 124 Pints... No Problem
description: Todays episode of The Pod opens up with the boys all catching up on their living situations. Mitt finally settled on a place and we're all excited for the stories to come, as Bills apartment has been taken over by his cats. The Boys then jump right into the Pod Fod where the boys pick their favorite cartoon dog, discuss death by buttcheacks,how much alcohol everyone in England has to drink to keep pubs alive and much much more. Don't forget to subscribe to the Youtube Channel, and submit your questions or comments to the Pod FOD at @ThePodPMI on Twitter and Instagram. We appreciate you all, we'll see you Wednesday.
